Flynn Group of Companies is the leading trade contractor in North America that works on virtually every aspect of a building’s outer layer, including Roofing, Glazing, Waterproofing, and Architectural Metals. The foundation of our award winning success is having the right people on our team.

We are also highly active and committed to creating an environment which is accessible to all of our customers, employees and applicants. Reasonable accommodations in the hiring process will be provided to people with disabilities upon request.

At Flynn, it's not just a job, it's a career

Flynn Group of Companies, North America’s leading building envelope contractor is looking for a seasoned Senior Web Application Developer to work from our Mississauga location.

Imagine a career where as a core member of the team, your creativity and technical skills can fuel BIG innovations, where your work will have a direct impact on the productivity of your client’s day-to-day lives. Work within a high performing team using leading edge cloud technology and a fast-paced work environment. You will have the unique opportunity to contribute to the product design and system scalability.

Our Tech Stack

Our primary tech stack is ASP.NET Core, Angular hosted on Amazon Web Services. We use MySQL and MongoDB as our primary databases. We utilize AWS services like EC2, Elastic Beanstalk, Lambda, S3 etc. to build scalable and fault tolerant production applications.

Here is a case study by Amazon on how Flynn uses AWS to streamline construction operations and communications: https://aws.amazon.com/solutions/case-studies/flynn/

Day In The Life
Will be a core member of the team to design, architect, development, code review, and test our key applications
Design new application features and integrations in collaboration with team members to deliver complex changes
Lead and drive all activities to integrate real and near-real time capabilities between new core products and other applications
Design and implement scalable and resilientcloud solutions with security and disaster recovery in mind
Ensure good code coverage and test coverage by writing and maintaining effective automated tests
Be a champion of code quality in team by adhering to CLEAN architecture and SOLID principles.
What We Are Seeking
Must have at least 8 years of experience
7+ years of experience working on web development (Preferably in Angular)
6+ experience with web development – Angular, Jquery, KondoUI, API, .NET Core, MongoDB and/or MySQL
4+ with cloud technologies – AWS or Azure.Experience working with integrating interconnected systems such as microservices
Solid understanding of and hands on experience with CLEAN architecture and SOLID principles
Experience in Agile environment using tools such as JIRA, Aha
Knowledge of security best practices
Experience with containerization
Nice to have: Experience working with observability and monitoring tools such as Sumo Logic, New Relic, CloudWatch, etc.
Nice to have: Experience working with DevOps concepts such as CI/CD and Infrastructure as Code
About You
Have a passion for- learning and delivering high quality products
Are curious and have a continuous learning mindset
Willing to question the status quo
Can work as part of a team & independently
Have excellent written & verbal communication skills
Be able to give and take criticism
What We Offer
Funded training and development program
Very well-equipped on-site gym
Dental and supplemental medical plan
RRSP contributions
Complimentary tea and coffee
Team lunches
Excellent on site, subsidized cafeteria
MSDN Subscription
Monthly Azure and AWS credits
Windows laptop with lots of RAM and an SSD
